ya10.3.5:5.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti?
ya10.3.5:6.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.5:7.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:8.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.5:9.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:10.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.5:11.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.5:12.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.5:13.1: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānanti.
ya10.3.5:14.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:15.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti?
ya10.3.5:16.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:17.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti?
ya10.3.5:18.1: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahanti anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyañca bhāvessati, domanassindriyañca pajahati.
ya10.3.5:19.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.5:20.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahatīti?
ya10.3.5:21.1: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahanti.
ya10.3.5:22.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:23.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.5:24.1: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāventi.
ya10.3.5:25.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.5:26.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.5:27.1: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāventi.
ya10.3.5:28.1: ⇒ Yo aññindriyaṃ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.5:29.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.5:30.1: Pañca puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāventi.
ya10.3.5:30.2: Tayo maggasamaṅgino aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti aññindriyañca bhāventi.
ya10.3.5:32.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissatīti?
ya10.3.5:33.1: Pañca puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissanti.
ya10.3.5:33.2: Cattāro puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti.
ya10.3.5:34.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.5:35.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti.
ya10.3.5:35.2: Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
ya10.3.5:36.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:37.1: Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:37.2: Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:38.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.5:39.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti.
ya10.3.5:39.2: Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
ya10.3.5:40.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:41.1: Satta puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:41.2: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:42.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.5:43.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti.
ya10.3.5:43.2: Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
ya10.3.5:44.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.5:45.1: Satta puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānanti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.5:45.2: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.5:46.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.5:47.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:48.1: Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyaṃ nappajahanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:48.2: Aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:49.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.5:50.1: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati.
ya10.3.5:50.2: Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
ya10.3.5:51.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:52.1: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahanti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:52.2: Tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:53.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.5:54.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahati so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.5:55.1: Satta puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahanti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.5:55.2: Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.5:56.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.5:57.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.5:58.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāventi, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:58.2: Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.5:59.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.5:60.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.5:61.1: Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāventi, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.5:61.2: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.5:62.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.5:63.1: ⇒ Yo aññindriyaṃ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.5:64.1: Pañca puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāventi, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.5:64.2: Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.5:65.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvetīti?
